consecutive Masters 1000 titles on different surfaces since the format started in 1990. As of May 2018, Zverev is the only active player other than the Big 4 (Federer, Nadal, Djokovic, and Murray) to own three or more Masters 1000 titles. Zverev is also the first player born in the 1990s to win multiple Masters 1000 titles. ====Singles: 6 (3 titles, 3 runner-ups)==== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !Result !Year !width=150|Tournament
